data.message: Hi! How can i log in for my facebook when i forget password and i used number phone for user and it had deleted from system mobie company?

replies.message: Hey there, Rithy. If you can't log into Facebook and need to reset your password, follow the instructions found in the Help Center: http://on.fb.me/1UDtuOU . Thanks. -Nancy
Are there any training videos for FB - how to best utilise FB?

I love the fact that I can stay in touch with my many friends and relatives here on facebook. I have even found more family whom I have missed for years. Facebook is a huge part of my family and I am very thankful for the freedom to use it to reach out to so many. Thank you so much for that.
